2021.08.14

Joomla system plugin CharactersCounterGhsvs 2021.08.14

Checksum entities: `&lt;sha256&gt;a1546256dee5e37d572716bc4210092c3266981f23cab12e8fea06f109ec8f94&lt;/sha256&gt;`

- Mainly fixes "When deactivating the already configured plugin, settings may be lost." (https://github.com/GHSVS-de/plg_system_characterscounterghsvs/issues/15).
